AssetWarranty.name: AssetWarranty
AssetWarranty.description: Defines the warranty terms applicable to an asset along with any exclusions and extensions.

AssetId.description: The ID of the asset this asset warranty applies to.

AssetWarrantyNumber.description: The identifier of the asset warranty record.

EndDate.description: The date on which this asset warranty expires.

ExchangeType.description: The type of exchange offered by this asset warranty.

ExpensesCoveredEndDate.description: The date on which cover for expenses ends.

IsTransferable.description: Indicates whether the asset warranty can be transferred to a new owner (true) or not (false).

LaborCoveredEndDate.description: The date on which cover for labor ends.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the asset warranty was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the asset warranty was last viewed.

PartsCoveredEndDate.description: The date on which cover for parts ends.

Pricebook2Id.description: The price book item associated with this asset warranty term.

StartDate.description: The date on which cover under this asset warranty starts.

WarrantyTermId.description: The ID of the warranty term this asset warranty term extends.

WarrantyType.description: The type of the asset warranty.
